gtv_overview.content: GTV (Global Talent Visa) 是英国为吸引全球顶尖人才而设立的签证类别

claude_code_integration.content: 使用Claude Code命令进行代码分析和评估，提供更智能的评估结果

exceptional_talent.content: Exceptional Talent签证要求申请人在其领域内具有国际认可的杰出成就

exceptional_promise.content: Exceptional Promise签证面向具有创新潜力和未来贡献能力的专业人士

startup_visa.content: Startup Visa面向具有创新商业计划的创业者

assessment_criteria.content: 评估标准包括：专业背景、工作经验、教育背景、成就记录、未来贡献潜力

mingg chen_exp_1.content: Shanghai Leshuis Education Technology Co., Ltd.: Taught A-Level, AP, IB, IGCSE courses, managed classroom feedback, homework, learning plans and assessments, participated in teaching/research activities, and supported marketing content. Industrial Securities Co., Ltd.: Assisted OGA development, conducted TMT industry research, feasibility analysis, working paper compilation, used modeling and interviews for business analysis, compiled research reports, performed compliance checks, and built valuation models. Skyeye International Accounting Firm: Led internal audit and risk control for 10+ departments, completed research and proposal reports, gained insights into insurance company risk management and process optimization. Shanghai Mingyao Equity Investment Management Co., Ltd.: Screened projects, drafted investment proposals, reported on industry information, mapped industry relationships, produced interview reports, summarized sales channel strategies, analyzed annual reports for revenue/profit trends and development strategies. Agricultural Bank of China, Shanghai Branch: Analyzed personal credit products, assessed product risk and design during pandemic, identified retail opportunities, assisted in digital marketing platform development, analyzed user data and retention strategies.

mingg chen_edu_1.content: The University of Manchester: MSc Economics (Aug 2022 - Dec 2023), QS Rank 34, Top 10% in major. Relevant coursework: Economic Theory Analysis (Econometrics, Microeconomics, Macroeconomics, Mathematical Economics), Applied Economic Analysis (R Language Econometric Analysis, Quantitative Analysis, Applied Development Economics Project). Nanjing Agricultural University: Bachelor of Agriculture and Forestry Economic Management (Sep 2018 - Jun 2022), National Rank #1, Top 10% in major. Relevant coursework: Economics, Accounting, Econometrics, Advanced Mathematics, Strategic Management.

mingg chen_ach_2.content: NAU Merit Student (2019, for Academic Excellence)

mingg chen_ach_3.content: University-level 'Outstanding Report' award for Rural Economic Survey Project

mingg chen_ach_4.content: University-Level First Prize in the 12th National College Student 'Innovation, Creativity & Entrepreneurship' Challenge
